column1: Rule 1: Modifiers containing both an amino group (-NH2) and a carboxylic acid group generally result in a high yield
column2: Rule 3: Modifiers containing a sulfur group (e.g., sulfanyl, -SH) in combination with a carboxylic acid group tend to result in a high yield
column3: Rule 5: Modifiers with multiple hydroxyl groups (polyols) and a carboxylic acid group tend to result in a high yield
